17105.「ここが ウワサの幽霊部屋 桜の間……。:
This is the rumored ghost room, the cherry
blossom room...

17106.「見たところ ふつうの部屋ですね。\n もうちょっと おどろおどろしい部屋を\n:
It's just an ordinary room. I imagined a more
frightening room. I might be a little
disappointed.

17129.「封印が 道を ふさいじゃってる。 \n それも なんて強いチカラ……。:
The seal is blocking the way. And what a
powerful force it is...

17130.「こんなに強い封印…… あたしには\n とても解けないです。先に進むのは\n あ:
Such a strong seal... I can't break it. I have
no choice but to give up on moving on...

17131.「やはり 私の読みに\n まちがいは なかったようだ。: It seems I was right after all.

17132.「すっ すごい！ 封印が 消えちゃった。\n でも先生…… いいんですか？:
Wow! The seal has disappeared. But, Sensei...
are you sure?

17134.「すっげー。ここが 神代の間なのかな。\n うへへ オイラ 足跡つけとこ。:
Amazing. I wonder if this is the God's Hall.
Hehehe, I'll leave a footprint.

17135.「どうしたってんだよ ハジカ先生～。\n いったい なにやってんだ？:
What's going on, Hajika-sensei~? What on earth
are you doing?

17136.「ああ…… すまない。そういえば\n 君たちに 借りていたものが あるんだ。\n:
Oh... I'm sorry. Oh, by the way, I borrowed
something from you guys. I'll return it here.

17138.「オイラが拾った ラブレター！！\n な なんで……？: The love letter I found! Why did you...?

17139.「ハジカ先生……\n ラブレターを 盗んだのは\n あなただったんですね。:
Dr. Hajika...it was you who stole the love
letters.

17146.「でた～～～～～～！！\n あんちゃーん！ 女の幽霊だよ！！: It's here!!! It's a woman's ghost!

17147.「ヒメア様！！ どうして ここに！？: Master Himea! What are you doing here?

17149.「ハジカ…… 封印を解いたのは\n そなただな？ 師とも あろうものが\n どう:
Hajika... you were the one who broke the seal,
weren't you? Shall we hear what the master
thinks?

17150.「ヒメア様の ご登場とは 参りましたね。\n あなたのことです。お察しでしょうか:
I am so excited to see you here, Master Himea.
It's you. I'm sure you've guessed, so I'll
make a frank confession.

17151.「私は あなたが ５００年前に使ったという\n 不老の禁術を 目当てに\n この:
I have come to Tsuskuru Village in search of
the elixir of life that you used 500 years
ago.

17152.「私は これまでの人生を\n すべて 学問に 捧げてきました。\n そして 悟っ:
I have devoted my entire life to learning. And
I've come to a realization.

17153.「真理に たどりつくには\n 人の一生は あまりにも短いと……。:
I believe that a man's life is too short to
reach the truth...

17154.「……死とは 残酷なものです。\n いかなる賢者の英知も 命が尽きれば\n 一瞬:
Death is a cruel thing. Even the wisdom of a
sage can be lost in an instant when life ends.

17155.「それで この神代の間へ\n 不老の禁術の書を 探しにきたというのか。:
So you have come to this God's Hall to search
for the Book of the Elixir of Life?

17156.「おそれを知らぬ 愚か者め。\n 不老の禁術は 書に残してなどおらぬ。:
Fearless fools! I did not leave the forbidden
art of immortality in writing.

17157.「愚か者……？ それは あなただ ヒメア。\n 不老の禁術が どれだけ人々に\n:
Fool...? It's you, Himea. You know how many
possibilities the Elixir of Agelessness brings
to people.

17158.「そのような すばらしい術を知りながら\n なぜ 世のために 使おうとしない？:
If you know such a wonderful technique, why
don't you use it for the good of the world?

17159.「あの禁術は そなたの思っているような \n 万能の術ではない。禁術のチカラを\:
The forbidden art is not the all-powerful art you think it is. There are only a limited number of people who can accept the power of
the forbidden arts.

17160.「多くの者は 禁術のチカラに たえきれず\n 人としての心と身体を失い 死ぬこと:
Many of them, unable to resist the power of the forbidden arts, lose their minds and bodies as human beings and, unable to die,
wander through eternity.

17161.「そう……。\n 先刻 ここを逃げだした あの獣のようにな。:
Yes... just like that beast that escaped from
here earlier.

17162.「この部屋は あの おぞましい獣を\n 閉じ込めておくために 封じていたのだ。\:
This room was sealed up to keep that horrid
beast in. What a superfluous thing to do.

17163.「私は あの獣を 捕らえなくてはならぬ。\n そなたらも 立ち去りなさい。: I must catch that beast. And you, go away.

17164.「あの獣は 不老の禁術の 犠牲者ということか。\n ……ならば ヤツの身体を調べ:
So the beast is a victim of the forbidden art of immortality. Then I must examine his body and reveal the power of the forbidden arts
with my own hands.

17165.「オイラが 桜の間で見た 女の幽霊って……\n ヒメア様だったんだな。:
The female ghost I saw among the cherry
blossoms... must have been Himea-sama.

17166.「うへへ…… オイラさ～\n ヒメア様に 会ったことなかったから\n カンちがい:
Heh heh... I've never met Himea-sama before,
so I must have misunderstood.

17167.「あ～ ゴホン！！ というわけで\n ついに 秘められた謎の部屋 神代の間の姿が:
Ah~ Gohon! And so, at long last, the hidden
mystery of the God's Hall has been revealed to
us!

17168.「みごと任務を完遂した 諸君らには \n 記念品を 贈呈しよう！ 受け取れい！:
And for those of you who have successfully
completed the mission, you will receive a
memento! Take it!

17169.「これにて 若葉の探検隊は 解散だ！\n さあ 帰ろう！ すぐ 帰ろう！:
And with that, our young explorers are
dismissed! Let's go home! Let's go home now!

17171.「まさか あたしたちの 探検が\n こんな結果を 招いてしまうなんて……。:
I never thought that our expedition would lead
to such an outcome.

17172.「でも こんな状況だというのに\n あたしには ひとつ どうしても\n 気がかり:
But even under such circumstances, there was
one thing that I couldn't help but worry
about.

17173.「なぜ ハジカ先生は\n コノタが拾った ラブレターなんて\n ほしがったんでし:
Why would Dr. Hajika want a love letter that
Konota picked up?

17174.「そのことが どうしても気になって\n あたしは ひとりになってから\n ラブレ:
I couldn't stop thinking about it, so when I
was alone, I opened the love letter... and
finally realized.

17175.「あたし……どうして 今まで \n このことに 気づかなかったんだろう……。: I don't know why I didn't notice this before.

39111.「この部屋の どこかに 神代の間へ続く\n 地下迷宮の入り口が あるはずです！\:
Somewhere in this room should be the entrance
to the underground labyrinth that leads to
God's Hall! Let's check various places.

60614.棚の下から 地下へ続く はしごが現れた！:
A ladder leading to the basement appeared
under the ledge!

60617.「ゆ ゆ 幽霊だ……！！\n 女の幽霊の声だよ あんちゃん！\n なあ 帰ろう！:
Yu-yu, a ghost! It's a female ghost's voice,
Anchan! Hey, let's go home! I knew it!

60618.「ビビってんなよ 風の音だろ？\n 諸君！ これより 我々 若葉の探検隊は\n:
Don't be scared. It's the wind, isn't it? Gentlemen! From now on, we, the young explorers, will set out for the God's Hall to
explore the underground!

60619.「この先 いかなる危険が あるともわからん。 \n しかし数々の苦難を 乗り越え:
We do not know what dangers lie ahead. But we
have overcome many hardships. I believe we
will all make it back alive!

60620.「……それで 生きて帰ってこれなかったら\n どうするつもりだい？:
So what are you going to do if you don't make
it back alive?

60622.「なにやら さわがしいから 来てみれば……\n 本当に 神代の間への道を 見つけ:
There was a noise, so I came and found that I
had indeed found my way to God's Hall.

60623.「行動力があるのは いいことだが \n 私が 師である以上 学徒の君たちに\n:
It is good that you are active, but since I am
your teacher, I cannot allow you, my students,
to act in a dangerous manner.

60624.「<pc>さん……と いいましたか。\n もちろん あなたもですよ。\n 探検ご:
<pc>...did I say that? And you, of
course. Will you give up your little game of
explorer and go home?<yesno><close>

60626.「オレは イヤだね。危険が なんだ！\n 先生だって 言ってたじゃないか！\n:
I don't like it. What's the danger? You said
so yourself! Tan Tan is the heart of learning.

60628.「オレも イヤだね。危険が なんだ！\n 先生だって 言ってたじゃないか！\n:
I don't like it either. What's so dangerous?
You said so yourself! Tan Tan is the heart of
learning.

60629.「あたしも この先に なにがあるのか\n 自分の目で 確かめたいんです。\n 行:
I want to see for myself what lies ahead.
Please let me go... please.

60631.「わかった。では こうしよう。\n 私も引率として 君たちに ついていく。:
All right. Let me put it this way. I will
follow you as your leader.

60632.「すこしでも 危険があったら引き返すこと。\n そして 絶対に はぐれないこと。:
If there is any danger, turn back. And never
stray. You promise me that, right?

60633.「さっすが ハジカ先生！\n 話の わかる男だぜ！:
That's my boy Hajika! You're a man who knows
what he's talking about!

60634.「それでは新たなメンバー 隊員４号を加えて\n 地下探検に 出発だ！！:
Now, let's add a new member to our team, Troop
#4, and let's go exploring underground!

60635.「えへ。ど どうしよう。\n ハジカ先生が 一緒だなんて……。:
Heh. What should I do? I can't believe Hajika-
sensei is with us...
